snippet.title: Polterguys Gameplay Trailer 2023
snippet.description: Polterguys is a fun-for-all-ages multiplayer game - a supernatural mix of whacky powerups and fast paced chases. The polterguys (ectoey little creatures) possess everyday objects to run around a quirky playlist of fantasy and real-world settings with a super-clear objective, which is to escape the Monster that is hunting them. We call it Last Polterguy Standing...
